actions.text: Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for additional compensation for services performed by certain employees in the House publications distribution service.

summary.text: Authorizes compensation for employees of the Publication Distribution Service of the House for services performed in excess of the normal workday when approved by the Committee on House Administration.

titles.title: A resolution providing for additional compensation for services performed by certain employees in the House publications distribution service.
